rage-scorecard
==============

A mobile-friendly scorecard web-app for a trick-based card game.

Use a recent snapshot of it at http://softshellcow.com/rage-scorecard/

[Running it directly from GitHub](data:text/html;charset=utf-8;base64, "using a data uri") might even work.

If you have it checked out, just use `via-local-file-uri.html`.
